resources.string: You are about to go back to main menu. If doing so, you\'ll lose all the progress.
This is a card game based on ice hockey! Full card deck (52 cards) represents a period. 3 periods will be played, with overtime if needed.\nSimple as that.
Both teams need to be fulfilled before the game can start. Choose your position for the card wisely!\n\nHint: Center is an important position.
Now it is time to attack! You can only attack another card whose rank is equal or less to your playing card. The center needs to be eliminated before you can attack any defender.
When you have been attacked and lost any players, you need to restore your team before you can counter-attack.\n\nGood luck!
